results.content: Excellent course. Chris provides clear concise instruction. Just went live with my site. Used this course to develop the original structure of the site. I have a greater comfort with CSS now that I worked through this course. Bootstrap integration really helped me worry less about creating a a basic uniform look and allowed me to focus on styling my content. I've purchased other Chris Converse courses. His content is always excellent and well edited.

His content is always excellent and well edited.

results.content: I enjoyed following the lessons. Maybe a bit fast paced for myself, but very productive. From my perception, this course assumes that you are familiar with html and css, and see in Twitter Bootstrap a nice way to improve your productivity. That said, the instructor don't dwell on the basics of css, jquery, or html.

results.content: The course is good, and informative, but i think its a little overpriced, anyway Chris is a good teacher, and if money is no problem for you, i recommend this course for you.

results.content: Its a great tutorial, even if you just thinking of buying it...don't think just buy its work the money. You get great resources, and code snippets that help you with responsive design (@media queries). Files are well organised, and the videos are downloadable so that you can watch it later. Great job Chris, I hope you do more courses because I'll be sure to follow them.

results.content: Very detailed and straight to the point. The project file attached is very helpful especially with the code snippet. I learnt a lot and can't wait to get my website up with Twitter Bootstrap design. Awesome!

results.content: There were a few areas that I felt might need more explanation such as use of hover on touch devices. Also it would be nice if you could showcase more of the plugins.

results.content: Simply copying and pasting throughout the course, not explaining for understanding at all.
results.content_html: Simply copying and pasting throughout the course, not explaining for understanding at all.

results.content:
An easy to understand walk through of building a responsive website with Bootstrap 2.

The course follows a logical well-paced progression & keeps focused on the Bootstrap features; rather than wasting time explaining the basics of HTML & CSS coding.

The instructor provides an excellent level of support via the Udemy Question & Answer facility.
results.content_html:
An easy to understand walk through of building a responsive website with Bootstrap 2.

The course follows a logical well-paced progression & keeps focused on the Bootstrap features; rather than wasting time explaining the basics of HTML & CSS coding.

The instructor provides an excellent level of support via the Udemy Question & Answer facility.

results.content:
I like the fact that Chris in this course and the last course he did which was creating a site implementing responsive design clearly demonstrates how to implement the concepts everyone has been promoting all over the Front End Developer Community. 

You come away from this course feeling like a top expert because Chris is no doubt a top expert right now. And he eliminates the misconceptions that you need specialized training in order to accomplish this. If you are a good Front End Web Developer this course is definitely for you.

results.content: Great and complete tutorial. One of the best on Udemy.com. Will bring you from 0 to 60 in and hour and a half.
results.content_html: Great and complete tutorial. One of the best on Udemy.com. Will bring you from 0 to 60 in and hour and a half.

results.content: Awesome intro into bootstrap .I am really going to use this for designing new websites.
results.content_html: Awesome intro into bootstrap .I am really going to use this for designing new websites.

results.content: This is a perfect introduction to Twitter Bootstrap 2. The lessons and project files are easy to follow and understand and just the right length. A lot of thought has gone in to the project files, especially the way the folders are set up for users who don't want to or can't use PhotoShop. The only downside to this course is that the Twitter Bootstrap is now updated to v3 but I highly recommend this course if you want an understanding of what Twitter Bootstrap is and how it can help you build websites.

A lot of thought has gone in to the project files, especially the way the folders are set up for users who don't want to or can't use PhotoShop. The only downside to this course is that the Twitter Bootstrap is now updated to v3 but I highly recommend this course if you want an understanding of what Twitter Bootstrap is and how it can help you build websites.

results.content: I picked up a few new things and will enjoy playing around in it.

results.content: The course covered everything I needed to know and quickly. I'm a much more visual person, so I enjoyed the videos more than reading long tutorials.
results.content_html: The course covered everything I needed to know and quickly. I'm a much more visual person, so I enjoyed the videos more than reading long tutorials.

results.content:
Chris has created a well thought through workflow prior creating this course.  

The work flow logic is excellent, mapped closely to how a most template developers think and work. This really makes it easy to work through each section of the course and build your template development skills.  

The code snippets, are an excellent way of quickly crafting the responsive template without getting involved in typos that would prevent the codespec being crafted from working.  

Then image / asset media queries were explained very simply and elegantly.

Thanks Chris.  Appreciate the effort put in.

Regards,

Ivan Bayross
